entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ConfigurationExtensions.GetRequiredValue #69163
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Analyzer/fixer for converting Stream.Read calls to ReadAtLeast and ReadExactly #69159
  • Fix IDE0075: Conditional expression can be simplified #69156
  • [monoapi] Change MonoAssemblyPreLoadFuncV3 to enable faster hooks #69155
    7.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackFrameTests.Ctor_FNeedFileInfo #69154
  • AssemblyName.GetPublicKeyToken() may return byte[160] instead of byte[8] #69153
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2022-23267 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #69149
  • Interop source generator should respect sign of the requested type for bool marshalling #69147
  • Can't install dotnet-runtime-6.0 (6.0.5) on debian bullseye #69146
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Possible race condition seen in `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.JSConditionalBreakpoint` #69144
  • [wasm] Fix new compiler warnings in the native code #69142
    7.0.0
  • Libraries linker tests aren't running in CI #69139
    7.0.0
  • Should we check-in a default set of tasks to make it easier to work within vscode? #69135
  • aspnet core Identity not working after deployment on server #69134
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate list?.Count #69133
    7.0.0
  • SSH from .NET Core support #69130
  • segfault when calling MarshalNative::GCHandleInternalGet in System.Net.Requests.Tests in rolling CI #69125
    7.0.0
  • Allow JsonExtensionData on Records #69123
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #69140
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_UInt64 #69143
  • Reconsider normal/no_tiered_compilation jobs #69122
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.5.22257.3] MaxInteger[T](System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[T])' violates the constraint of type parameter 'T' exception error #69119
  • Rename mentions of Redhawk to NativeAOT. #69115
  • Installer Build and Test failures in rolling CI #69114
  • GC\LargeMemory\API\gc\gettotalmemory\gettotalmemory.cmd failed in rolling with "Large Memory Machine required" #69113
  • AnalyzerReference vs ProjectReference #69111
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.EnvironmentTests.OSVersion_ValidVersion failing in CI #69110
  • `System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout` failing on `Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x86 Release` #69101
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add async overload of ChangeToken.OnChange #69099
    Future
  • Marshalling a collection of elements that require two-stage marshalling does not preserve the marshaller state? #69096
  • Improve gRPC support on mobile platforms #69095
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/SIMD/Matrix4x4_r/Matrix4x4_r.sh #69093
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/Arrays/lcs/lcs2_r/lcs2_r.cmd #69092
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\tailcalls_do\\tailcalls_do.cmd #69090
  • Return value marshalling should not require CustomTypeMarshallerDirection.In #69086
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Creating symbolic links without developer mode or elevation fails silently #62975
    7.0.0
  • Thousands of analyzer warnings are thrown inside Visual Studio #68764
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Base64 #68821
    7.0.0
  • Can't build on MacOS clr+libs #69161
  • NetworkInformation tests show weird error on macOS #64441
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][nodejs] `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_HttpClientHandlerTest_Headers_Http11.SendAsync_ContentLengthAndTransferEncodingHeaders_IgnoreContentLength` #69085
  • Problems with ASP.NET projects when consuming .NET Standard assets #25770
    Future
  • Enable TLS tickets / resumption with OpenSSL on Linux #22977
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add LifetimeAnnotationAttribute #68622
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Tests fails on iOS/tvOS #36892
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Not implemented: System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicILInfo.SetExceptions(Byte* exceptions, Int32 exceptionsSize) #31858
    7.0.0
  • Build crossgen with NativeAOT and trimming #64571
    7.0.0
  • Segfault inside JIT in libraries-jitstress #68756
  • PAL uses wrong type for chflags flags #69005
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #68443
    7.0.0
  • Linux arm64 Release NativeAOT failures in System.Reflection.Tests #69136
  • [Eng] RunOnly Wasm Runtime Tests Will Fail Non-Deterministically; Add locking #41193
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Test failed: System.Tests.GCTests.LatencyRoundtrips* #31657
    7.0.0
  • Benchmark Dotnet AOT build failing with exit 1 #67098
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Implement SetGCLatencyMode and SetLOHCompactionMode #46666
    7.0.0
  • Source Generator projects don't need to be included in other library's sln files #58879
    7.0.0
  • [WASM runtime test infrastucture] Environment variable is not set: 'CORE_ROOT' #41520
    7.0.0
  • overview of long running library tests #35101
    Future
  • If RemoteExecutorConsoleApp the exit code's meaning it unclear and the actual exception is hidden #21523
    Future
  • Annotate corefx build artifacts with commit hashes #30520
    Future
  • Way to unload a Managed assembly from native library using hostfxr #68949
  • System.Text.Json test failures on Android x86 #49936
    7.0.0
  • Consider removing the System.Memory dependency from TestUtilities on .NETFramework #53422
    Future
  • System.Private.CoreLib.xml is missing from the ref folders #48726
    Future
  • Discussion about how references are defined in libraries #48238
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl project has problems loading in Visual Studio #47809
    7.0.0
  • [Question] Why test libraries that target single TFM use TargetFrameworkS (plural)? #47155
    7.0.0
  • Protect visual studio in CI for libraries #45007
    Future
  • The original target frameworks value must match the aliases while restore #45400
    7.0.0
  • Compose the shared framework without depending on OOB libraries #43118
    7.0.0
  • Make Runtime.json generation better support merging architectures into compatible runtimegroups #66316
  • Unable to build downloaded Release 5.0 runtime preview 5 on Ubuntu 16.04 #37325
    Future
  • CLS-Compliant issue spotted during intellisense for ref in System.DirectoryServices #34953
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm] Satellite assemblies loading failure #68192
  • Fixing build for src/shims/manual to use appropriate configurations #29206
    Future
  • Update license for Microsoft.Bcl.Async nuget #28930
    Future
  • CI Failure: Build Browser wasm Linux Release LibraryTests #68718
  • Remove API Compat baseline validation suppression #68730
    7.0.0
  • Detached ProcessExit() make the main process exit at once with SIGTERM #67294
  • [wasm][aot] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests - Maximum call stack size exceeded #61061
    7.0.0
  • pal::get_own_executable_path() does not work properly with hardlink on FreeBSD #3335
    Future
  • [mono] FullAOT runtime test failures: condition `out_obj' not met #57361
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Eliminate unnecessary load in `TrySetSlot` #69164
    community-contribution
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to System.Text.Json #69160
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #69152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix a typo #69145
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Re-enable Android OOM test failures #69138
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
  • [GDBJIT] Fix "section extending past end of file" warning #69124
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Deadlock mitigation for debugging #69121
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix linker tests not running and show full path during trimming test execution #69118
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Substitute GT_RET_EXPR in inline candidate arguments #69117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error if a reference assembly is platform specific #69116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address some System.Formats.Tar TODOs #69107
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Support strictly blittable type marshalling #69100
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • avoid allocationg ApplicationProtocol in common case #69098
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Removing comments so won't overwrite doc changes #69089
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution

Merged

  • CreateSymbolicLink PInvoke retval must be marshalled as U1 #69150
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Update minimum required version of VS to 17.3 #69162
    documentation
  • Fix typo in AssemblyName handling #69157
    area-System.Reflection

    area-Infrastructure-libraries

    arch-wasm, area-Serialization, disabled-test
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Fix crash in `EvaluateOnCallFrameTests` on CI #69073

    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated
